All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
CompileAndRun
This class is responsible for compiling and running the source codes.
Database
This class is responsible for all the database operations.
IUTForces_Server
This class is the class consisting of the main function.
LoginSignUpHandler
This class handles all the Login and Signup operations.
MultiThread
This class handles running of multiple threads of execution and it inherits the Runnable class.
Server
This class handles the initiation and termination of the server.
ServerInterface
This is the interface class for the Server GUI.
SocketForClient
This class the Socket related functions from the client's side.
